title: 46  Liya Yakovlevna Raitser, VKB/P (The Communist Party), 1929

content:
<section class="osci-tk-epub-section tombstone" id="tombstone">46  
Designed by Liya Yakovlevna Raitser (Russian, 1902–1988)  
Manufacturer unknown  
Russia  
VKB/P (The Communist Party)  
1929  
Cotton, plain weave; screen-, roller-, or block-printed; 12 × 8.1 cm (4 3/4 × 3 1/4 in.)  
Harriott A. Fox and Mrs. Siegfried G. Schmidt endowments, 1993.57
